Solve Mineswepper with DQN

Python, RL, Web

Solved Minesweeper using DQN. Trained a model with an average win rate of 84%(easy level). Solved theoretical minesweeper, web for deployment.

Publication

2024
ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Solve Gomoku with AlphaZero

Jimin Lee, Team AiGO

KangHwaSisters In Club Conference

Abstract

This research aims to enable a dual-agent Gomoku game where a human and an AI agent interact in real life through a 4-degree-of-freedom (4-DOF) robotic arm equipped with a suction-based end-effector. The AI agent is trained using the AlphaZero methodology, leveraging forward and inverse kinematics for robotic arm control. To enhance the performance of the Gomoku agent, data augmentation, neural network diversity, and noise-driven exploration were incorporated into the training process. The developed agent, trained in a 9Ã—9 board environment, demonstrates an average step count exceeding 25 moves per game.
